Comment: I hate speaking on the phone with people I don’t so this app makes my life easier !
it uses a lot of battery power. Battery dies really quickly.
Easy to use no problems had with this app. Taxi or car rental very easy with good price.
Useful and great price value with the Urban subscription. I use it daily when I commute and occasionally for 10e taxi rides in Helsinki and city bike rides in the summer.

Been using this in Birmingham for the past few weeks as a pay monthly Whim Everyday user. Been really happy with the app and service so far, from the initial customer representative I spoke to on the street to using the app and travel card on a daily basis. Highly recommended, looking forward to the bikes hitting town!
This app contains a lot of transportation methods, which is more convenient than other transportation apps around here, at least in Helsinki

Love it! Saved me multiple times when I used to forget my bus card at home, and when there was no card loading place nearby. Now it completely replaced my bus card and it feels great - no more worries that I might forget the bus card at home, lose it, or it might have expired. It has also completely replaced Google Maps for me. Looking forward for new features
one of the best way to buy public transport tickets
